title: Upgrading chain index stuck on bloombits error="block #16142464 [9efc5a81..] not found"
body:
#### System information

Geth version: `1.13.0-stable`
CL client & version: lighthouse@4.2.0
OS & Version: archLinux

#### Expected behaviour
Upgrading chain index type=bloombits should complete

#### Actual behaviour
My `Upgrading chain index` has been stuck for 7h on the same missing block error

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
Not sure what the cause is, this happened during a normal `removedb` and resync. I have attempted a restart after the first few occurrences of this error but that didn't fix anything and the same error keeps getting repeated

```
Upgrading chain index                    type=bloombits percentage=88
Syncing: state download in progress      synced=12.03% state=28.13GiB  accounts=26,568,059@5.36GiB   slots=105,293,132@21.87GiB codes=161,303@930.97MiB eta=2h19m31.220s
Syncing: chain download in progress      synced=99.92% chain=554.39GiB headers=18,126,093@8.26GiB bodies=18,111,605@388.17GiB receipts=18,111,605@157.96GiB eta=3m38.922s
Forkchoice requested sync to new head    number=18,126,094 hash=ce02d4..3cece2 finalized=18,126,009
Upgrading chain index                    type=bloombits percentage=89
Syncing: state download in progress      synced=12.08% state=28.32GiB  accounts=26,675,845@5.38GiB   slots=106,088,259@22.03GiB codes=161,657@933.16MiB eta=2h19m47.563s
Syncing: chain download in progress      synced=99.92% chain=554.39GiB headers=18,126,094@8.26GiB bodies=18,112,375@388.17GiB receipts=18,112,375@157.96GiB eta=3m27.277s
Upgrading chain index                    type=bloombits percentage=89
Forkchoice requested sync to new head    number=18,126,095 hash=947f13..9cd509 finalized=18,126,009
Syncing: state download in progress      synced=12.17% state=28.48GiB  accounts=26,870,389@5.42GiB   slots=106,642,678@22.14GiB codes=162,732@940.05MiB eta=2h19m23.555s
Section processing failed                type=bloombits error="block #16142464 [9efc5a81..] not found"
```

The bloom indexer is not supposed to run before the node is synced up. Also the missing block `16142464` should be present the log tells `Syncing: chain download in progress      synced=99.92% chain=554.39GiB headers=18,126,094@8.26GiB bodies=18,112,375@388.17GiB receipts=18,112,375@157.96GiB eta=3m27.277s`

Did you keep the ancient folder when run `removedb`?
